'''Arahaoma''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|The Final Chapter}}.

Arahaoma must be brewed under moonlight and requires three plants: [[Zohrah Mushroom]], [[Barsam Flower]], and [[Yajna Grass]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Final Chapter}}</ref>

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* "Arahaoma" uses the same "Ara-" prefix as the [[Aranara]] attached to the Avestan word {{Lang|{{w|Haoma|''haoma''}}|ae=𐬵𐬀𐬊𐬨𐬀|ae_rm=haoma}}, a divine plant in {{w|Zoroastrianism}}.
